name: Rogue Pony Conspiracy
description:
You are Ponyboy Francis, working on your Pony Farm during the holiday season. Your only job is to help kids of tourists on your ponys, so they can have all the fun in the world riding them.

Everything could be just so peachy... If it weren't for those darn Proud Ponys! This vile group of conspiring ponys wants to ruin your family-run business. So they have sworn to kill every kid you put on them.

You need to rely on your Pony Farm Intel Reports to avoid the traitors and allow for the holiday experience the children deserve - and their parents pay for.

How much money can you earn during one season?

Controls
  • Arrow Keys: navigate
  • X: confirm, pick up kid, put kid on pony
  • Brain: memorize ponys
A little background

This is my first game ever and I made it in two weeks as part of my studies. So every kind of feedback, advice, suggestion and critique is welcome.

Credits

Design, Art, Code, Music: Sebastian Stricker

Special Thanks to Krystian Majewski from Lazy Devs Academy for all the coding tutorials, and Gruber Music for all the music tutorials.
